overview: Cover: Ahn, who is undercover, investigating in a gang, accidentally posts the information of the organization in the group chat room.  Bong: The timid housewife Jeong Hwa finds no sign of her husband's cheating but is not angry. And then accidentally learns pole dancing.  Jeok-gu: Hong Joo, a convenience store part-timer, finds a man far away making fun of a woman on his way home.  Stalker: A group of intellectually disabled people comes to the cafe and acts strangely.  Synchroman: Sang Tae commits crimes with synchro ability.
title: Ahn Sang-tae Short Film Collection Vol.1
